arts.ttl: Bochum goalkeeper Timo Horn gutted after critical error leads to loss: “I should have held the ball.”
arts.sum: Newly installed VfL Bochum #1 Timo Horn had to swallow his pride when commenting on a mistake in his side's latest Bundesliga defeat. Lead VfL striker Philipp Hofmann - with his own gulp - also had to reflect on a tough forthcoming fixture list for the Revierklub.

arts.ttl: Tom Bischof's long-range strike gives Hoffenheim crucial win over Bochum in relegation battle
arts.sum: Hoffenheim secured a crucial 1-0 victory away at Bochum in a tense relegation six-pointer as Tom Bischof scored the only goal of the game with a long-range effort in the 72nd minute. The match, laden with tension and importance for both sides' Bundesliga survival hopes, saw Hoffenheim snatch all three points thanks to a 72nd-minute long-range strike from Bischof .

arts.ttl: German football fans disagree with Union Berlin-Bochum match ruling
arts.sum: A snap poll from Germany's preeminent footballing publication confirms that the German footballing public disagree with latest ruling awarding VfL Bochum three points in a disputed December Bundesliga fixture with 1. FC Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin announce final appeal in case of disputed Bochum match: “Precedence, not politics.”
arts.sum: Union Berlin have one last possible option to exhaust when it comes to a disputed December Bundesliga match that saw Bochum awarded three points after a 1-1 draw was nullified due to spectator interference.

arts.ttl: Official | Union Berlin lose appeal in disputed Bochum match
arts.sum: VfL Bochum have now officially picked up three points from the disputed 1-1 with 1. FC Union Berlin earlier this season.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt eye Hoffenheim’s Anton Stach as potential Hugo Larsson replacement
arts.sum: Germany's main sporting tabloid reports that Eintracht Frankfurt are taking a close look at German youth international Anton Stach.

arts.ttl: Bochum vs Hoffenheim preview: Points up for grabs in crucial bottom-end clash
arts.sum: Bochum and Hoffenheim go head to head at Vonovia Ruhrstadion on Saturday, with the hosts looking to climb out of the bottom two.

arts.ttl: Baumann could return for Hoffenheim against Bochum
arts.sum: Christian Ilzer has revealed that Oliver Baumann could make his return to the Hoffenheim goal for this weekend's game against VfL Bochum.

arts.ttl: Preview: VfL Bochum vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between VfL Bochum and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
